channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump adviser Stephen Miller insists East Wing of White House ‘is not part of the White House’ – as it happened
item.description: This blog is now closed. Read our latest story here The US secretary of state has confirmed Donald Trump’s announcement that all trade negotiations wi...

item.title: Ex-60 Minutes producer Bill Owens says bosses discouraged him from covering Gaza and Trump
item.description: Show’s leader, who resigned in April, says he was also pressured to apologize for edit of Kamala Harris interview The former executive producer of 60 ...

item.title: Thailand’s Queen Mother Sirikit dies at 93 after more than a decade out of the public eye
item.description: Prime minister Charnvirakul cancels trip to Asean summit in Malaysia after news of the Queen Mother’s death Thailand’s Queen Mother Sirikit, who broug...

item.title: US places sanctions on Colombian president over alleged failure to stop cartels
item.description: Treasury accuses Gustavo Petro of ‘allowing drug cartels to flourish’ as president attacks Trump’s ‘oppressive regime’ The US treasury department has ...

item.title: At least four people shot near Howard University, Washington DC police say
item.description: Police say one person critical and one person in serious condition but no details on suspect or suspects A shooting near Howard University has left at...

item.title: 'One out... by mistake' and Prince Andrew 'dislodged'
item.description: The fallout after a former asylum seeker who assaulted a 14-year-old girl was mistakenly released from prison leads the papers.

item.title: Thailand's former queen Sirikit dies aged 93
item.description: The mother of King Vajiralongkorn passed away "peacefully" on Friday night, according to the Thai Royal Household.

item.title: McLaren 'already behind' as Verstappen sets practice pace
item.description: Red Bull driver Max Verstappen goes fastest in the second practice session at the Mexico City Grand Prix.

item.title: Chief prosecutor says top official would not call China an enemy
item.description: Stephen Parkinson sets out why the case against two alleged spies was dropped in a letter to MPs.

item.title: Venezuela's Maduro says US 'fabricating war' as it deploys world's largest warship
item.description: The deployment of the USS Gerald R Ford marks a major escalation in what the US says is a campaign to target drug traffickers.
